extendedInfo.description: ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH MINI INFO CLASSIC, NOT MINI INFO+Mini Info Pro Key 2.0, the most beautiful system health monitor on Android just got more awesome. It gives everything you need in a fast, easy to use display, now with more customization than ever.**Note: you need both the main Mini Info app and the Pro Key both installed to work. This Pro Key itself has no layout and cannot be launched (opened). Launch Mini Info as usual to unlock the Pro Features-----Features:-----Widget Templates:Choose from classic Mini Info Three Column, Solo Detailed, Two Row and Two Column now with the new innovative configuration page, mixing and matching items from Battery, Disk space, SD Card space, RAM and CPU with minimal effort.Customization:You now get access some of the most powerful settings in Mini Info. with Center Info to get the most out of your screen estate, Progress Bar colors for a fun, funky touch and Toggle Bar Settings described belowToggle Bar:Use drag and drop to reorder the Toggle Bar to move the most used items to the front. For the ones you don't need or don't use, hide them by unchecking the box. It's as easy as that!Other goodiesUse a home replacement that supports widget resizing for even more fun layout options like 3x1 and 4x1 widgets!-----Testimonials:-----"Mini Info fits battery charge, local memory, and/or SD memory monitoring all into a simple 2x1 widget." - Lifehacker (http://lifehac.kr/felfGY)"Iâve used other Android system monitors before, but this one really takes the cake." - TalkAndroid (http://bit.ly/fJLWm6)-----Developed By: -----Dynotes Mobile Technology LTD.http://www.dynotes.comFollow us on Twitter! @dynotesycmobile2000@gmail.comUpdated 2011-06-18**Please read the Documentation (About + Help) before commenting. Contact us in Menu - About + Help for specific questions. There are lots of questions that we can solve, but we cannot provide feedback in the current Market comment system

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Finally found a decent info app, love resource usage, very informative and great to customise!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it! Very fast, nimble and informative. Great at a glance application to see how your phone is set up. Then make changes on the fly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: JUNK RIPOFF
reviews.comment: i paid for your SO SO app, used it on my OLD cell, NOW it WONT even show on my NEW HTC REZOUND :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flashlight
reviews.comment: Every now and then fails to register that I have pro key, but minor issue. Would like a 3-stage flashlight toggle though =D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Great detail and info on just about all you need to know And many options!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it! No need for pwr settings bar to take up space, toggle bar does it all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My QUADCORE
reviews.comment: Nice app gives me information I need all in one place
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice update.. major change!!! Much better than ever.... thank you! T mobile G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 3 col with 2 infos (ram and cpu) shows on for ram 512 mb and ?? % on my SGS2. Please can you correct the percent info for the ram part?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Key purchased - app still showing ads
reviews.comment: Have had it on 2 prev. devices, worked well (unless if no network avail.). Now, with the 3rd device, installed reg-key is not recognised by the app:-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great except for one thing
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the Toggle Bar to remember my settings. As soon as I check or uncheck an item this app seems to have a mind of its own. I can live with it since I use Dazzle and didn\'t get this app for a control panel. It\'s very useful to see available RAM and storage at a glance. Bought it primarily for a RAM usage widget. Still working on possibility of displaying battery temperature in a widget instead of charge %. In spite of the Toggle Bar, nicely done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved mini info free. But this is bad. -turning all toggles off makes the pop completely squashed and unreadable -to many more problems to list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sgs 3
reviews.comment: What happened!!!loved this app, now utility won\'t even open.plse fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Cheats legacy users out of their money. Uninstall promptly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says.
reviews.comment: A great little widget that gives u all the info u need about you device.
reviews.author: Mark MacCurrie

reviews.title: OK by me
reviews.comment: Ads appear to be removed after reinstalling Pro key (v2). Beautiful design & graphics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A bit disappointing.
reviews.comment: Pretty but not too smart. Broken settings, no adjustable upd interval. (G2, Nook Color)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Helpful app. I am still fiddling around with this to see how essential it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ADs
reviews.comment: Bought the key but still has ads. Removed key but kept app. App is GREAT!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally an app that does what it says :)
reviews.comment: Great app - would love a 1x1 widget though as I like to see RAM available on the home screen and at the moment it takes up 2 columns :(
reviews.author: A Google User
